title: Properties of image formed by convex lens

content.prompt: An object PQ is located to the left of a converging lens having focal points F, as shown in the figure above. The image formed by the lens is

choices.label: real, inverted, and smaller than the object
real, inverted, and larger than the object
real, upright, and larger than the object
virtual, upright, and larger than the object
virtual, upright, and smaller than the object
